name: FriendlyMeal
desc: Developed performant ecommerce website using React routing, lazy loading, and optimized search.
Implemented CRUD functionality to create, read, update, and delete products and data.
Optimized for all devices: desktop, tablet, and mobile.

name: Portfolio
desc: Developed a visually appealing portfolio website with smooth animations on scroll.
Included a user-friendly contact form to easily get in touch with me directly from the website.
Optimized for all devices: desktop, tablet, and mobile.
